</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a MP campaign display. The class name must be a mission collection declared in the configs; for example, <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[configFile]]&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"CfgMissions"&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"MPMissions"&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"Apex"</value></part></template><br>
If the class doesn't exist or isn't a mission collection, the display will be created empty. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display [[createMPCampaignDisplay]] class </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display - [[Display]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - Mission collection class [[name]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[createMPCampaignDisplay]] "Apex";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createMissionDisplay]], [[playMission]], [[createDisplay]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
